entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong height for multi-line Label under certain conditions #11358
  • Create window level platform specific for SetWindowSoftInputModeAdjust #11355
    Backlog
  • MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync missing important option like SaveToAlbum, PhotoSize, CompressionQuality #11353
  • IOS Content and Controls inside Frame not Showing #11351
  • CarouselView RTL hangs #11350
  • iOS app crashes after launch for release build distributed via TestFlight #11349
  • Xcode 14.1 not compatible whit VS 2022 #11348
  • android application with testOnly option set to true can't be deployed #11345
  • Picker on windows not load in MVVM #11343
  • Error : Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle at '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' #11339
    Backlog
  • Android-.NET6-Style issue when changing the button status (disabled->enabled) #11336
  • [iOS] ImageButton in FlexLayout not clickable #11335
  • App.Current.Resources.MergedDictionaries.Add Unavailable switch the second time #11334
  • iOS The type initializer for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape' threw an exception. on latest .NET 7 #11333
  • Provide access to current map zoom level #11332
    Backlog
  • After updating Application.Current.MainPage, navigation to other pages doesn't work #11330
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] If MainPage overrides OnBackButtonPressed, OnBackButtonPressed and Android back button stop being called for other pages #10561
  • VS will no longer create a useable Maui project #11061
  • Allow Android archiving for both Apk and Aab formats #11077
  • .NET MAUI RC 2 app using SaxonCS NuGet library runs fine on Windows but crashes with "[libc] Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR)" on Android #6811
    Backlog
  • Error while trying to run sample app for first time #9467
  • Problem with publishing app to Apple App Store - Asset validation failed (90171) #8701
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Can't run my MAUI program on an android emulator #11249

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary MeasureOverride from RefreshView; #11357
  • Set window soft input via window mapper #11356
  • Fix iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580 #11352
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Add debug agent info #11347
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13

Merged

  • Merge net7.0 into main #11290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • restore unittests for native views binding #11341

Updated

  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [Tizen] Add Label TextType #11103
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Try creating workload packs instead #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11289
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11257
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add basic Android automated accessiblity testing #11097
    area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11193
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.6 to 7.0.0 #11190
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • CodeQL only on main/non-public builds #11273
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
